name: Brick Breaker 1.0
description: is a fun filled game in which you shoot a cannon at blocks to destroy them and the amount of hits each block needs is written on the block. It seems pretty simple on the surface. But, as you progress, the blocks increase in number. Pickups also show up which help you destroy even more blocks. This addictive game will have you hooked for hours. Can you rack up the most points?
